DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the usefulness of Cyberknife precision radiation in eliminating or preventing the further growth of spinal tumors and lesions.
DOC.brief_title: Cyberknife Precision Radiation Delivery System for Tumors of the Spine
DOC.criteria: Intraaxial, extraaxial, or vertebral spinal lesion Age > 5 Histologic confirmation of malignant primary lesion or radiographic diagnosis of benign or vascular spinal lesion No rapidly deteriorating symptoms of spinal cord compression No instability of the spine Life expectancy > 6 months Patients without tumors of the spine Patients younger than 5 years old
